name: FIFA 15 Ultimate Team
summary: FIFA 15 Ultimate Team™ features over 10,000 players from over 500 licensed teams. Plus, over 30 real leagues and stadiums! Build a dream squad of footballers and put them to the test. From the English Premier League, La Liga, and MLS, to the German Bundesliga and beyond. Take the thrill of football with you wherever you are with the most authentic football game on the App Store.
info:
• 中文名: FIFA 15 终极球队
